channel.title: Max player limit?
channel.description: Hi im sirholkms admin of nerdscape.no-ip.org and I use a modifyed version of the MEGAscape source and I am wondering is there a max player limit for my server because I would like to change it, it seems the max player limit is 4 :(

item.title: Max player limit?
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

exeption in thread “Thread-0” java.langOutofmemory error: java heaps space from what i can gather off of google means "that the memory allocated for Java has ran out. " idk how to fix it but ill look more on google lol…

EDIT: Sorry im kinda lost but try looking around on google.com…

Read full topic

item.title: Max player limit?
item.dc:creator: @sirholkms sirholkms
item.description:
@sirholkms wrote:

wait it says exeption in thread “Thread-0” java.langOutofmemory error: java heaps space

does that mean my computer dosnt have enough ram to support more than 4 people because my computer is new and its good![br][size=1]Posted at: August 05, 2006, 02:37:18 AM[/size][hr]bump…

Read full topic

item.title: Max player limit?
item.dc:creator: @cappy cappy
item.description:
@cappy wrote:

open playerhandler.java, and right below the top it should say
public static final int maxPlayers = 30;

And change the 30 to what you want. Your might not be 30 though

Read full topic
